location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran, to Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: Justin Sheil refers to Samuel Hennell's letter of 7 January 1850, no. 5, which reported the renewal of the Nawab Hajeea's claim to certain estates in Cazeroon [Kāzerūn]. Sheil requests that Hennell do all in his power to have the matter adjusted in the law court at Bushire.
